pr_title: adding additional role meta attributes via templates

timeline.bodyText:
The change itself is not sufficient since it's possible that the user has made some changes already and thus we don't want to lose any of those changes. So I want to make our logic a little more smarter.
When applying the template and updating the role, we should read the original values and only override those that have been specified in the template. (let's have a unit test for this case as well).
timeline.author: havetisyan
